vision.get_faces¶

vision.get_faces(image_path, mode='save', output_dir='faces', padding=0.5, model='hog', upsample_factor=1, landmarks=True, only_landmarked=True, overwrite=False)[source]¶

Get all faces within an image

Parameters:
  • image_path (str) – filepath to an image file
  • padding (float) – pecentage of padding to expand
  • upsample_factor (int) – number of times to upsample image
Returns:

faces – list of images of faces in the given image
Return type:

list
